Storyline: Movement of the forces to Paris
March to the East (Lüttich) and Heinrich ill
Joining of the four Regiments in Stettin
Minette the Swiss Lady's horse (in Marienwerder)
Disintegration of the Regiments, keeping one's own business
Upheaval in Europe and home for Katharina
Return to Luzern, the Inn "Engel", the "Trockenbund"
Bankrupcy and death of Josef Morel
Teaching others in the Pension Morel
